title: God's Hand Is Outstretched Toward You | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: God's Hand Is Outstretched Toward You | Joel Osteen
description:
You don’t have to go through life depending on your own strength and ability. All through the day, remember that God’s hand is outstretched toward you. His power is greater than any force that might come against you!

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
